author: vors
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
Issue was originally reported in https://github.com/PowerShell/platyPS/issues/328

- Take or create maml xml with more than 1 paragraph entry in the sysnopsis, i.e. https://github.com/PowerShell/platyPS/files/1569365/Microsoft.Exchange.RolesAndAccess-Help.xml.zip
- Run the xml thru help engine (for instance with using `Get-HelpPreview`).
- The rendered object will contain all paragraphs in SYNOPSYS as expected

```powershell
$h = Get-HelpPreview ~/Downloads/Microsoft.Exchange.RolesAndAccess-Help.xml
$user = $h | ? {$_.Name -eq 'Get-User'}
$user
```

```

NAME
    Get-User
    
SYNOPSIS
    This cmdlet is available in on-premises Exchange Server 2013 and in the cloud-based service. Some parameters and 
    settings may be exclusive to one environment or the other.
    
    Use the Get-User cmdlet to retrieve all users in the forest that match the specified conditions.
    
    For information about the parameter sets in the Syntax section below, see Syntax.
    
    
```

- get `Synopsis` property on the object
```
$user.Synopsis
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

Same 3 paragraphs

Actual behavior
---------------

Only the first paragraph returns.

```
This cmdlet is available in on-premises Exchange Server 2013 and in the cloud-based service. Some parameters and settings may be exclusive to one environment or the other.
```
